content: Which iconic American singer, known as the "King of Rock and Roll", gave us hits like "Heartbreak Hotel" and "Jailhouse Rock"?

That would be Elvis Presley. He's often referred to as the "King of Rock and Roll" due to his significant influence on the genre and popular culture as a whole. His hits like "Heartbreak Hotel" and "Jailhouse Rock" are indeed iconic and have stood the test of time.
